::Magmatron::

    Magmatron signaled for Mantella to stop firing. He then opened a comm to 
the Iron Fist.
    "I will tell you one more time to surrender the ship, or I will destroy 
it." Magmatron said. "Mantella, go back to base and tell Bobertron to press 
the little red button in the locked glass case of my command chair. And after 
that get some rest, you might be needing it."
    Magmatron was prepared for the Nemisis herself. So he was hoping that if 
this ship was going to attack his base it would have similar armaments as the 
Nemisis.

(I need you guys to reply, I don't care how, just reply. Even shoot me if you 
have to just give me something to work with.)
